question: Which of the following crops is most badly affected crop in India due to Monocropping culture?
explanation: Cotton production in country is most badly affected due to Monocropping culture. Monocropping culture is used in cotton cultivation because it is driven by healthy returns due to large demand of Indian cotton in China and other countries. But cotton is subjected to large-scale crop damage from whitefly infestation and from pink bollworm.
